text: @gtconway3d It’s difficult to logically assess so much blame on President Trump, especially because the COVID-19 is a NEW and UNPREDICTABLE virus.  No one could predict the outcome. He has taken preventative measures from the beginning with restrictive travel, which Democrats objected to!!
